content: german-twisted-cast-on my yardage estimates are generous- actual yardage used in knitting these mitts has been closer to 102-103 yds as judged by weighing the yarn prior to knitting the mitts and after knitting them on the last row of the thumb gusset i find that if i knit some sts tight i get a better thumb gusset these sts are on the last row of the gusset- the sts in the corners- those being the last st of the hand and the first st of the thumb gusset and then the last st of the thumb gusset and the first st of the hand on the next row i knit tight the last st of the hand the backwards-loop cast-on st and the first st of the new round this helps to avoid a gap where the thumb has been joined © 2014 by b s knees knits
